metadata.title: CVE-2021-47057 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: sun8i-ss - Fix memory leak of object d when dma_iv fails to mapIn the case where the dma_iv mapping fails, the return error path leaksthe memory allocated to object d.  Fix this by adding a new error returnlabel and jumping to this to ensure d is free'd before the return.Addresses-Coverity: ("Resource leak")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
